website_summaries.verdict: Eliminates redness while treating acne, as well as preventing future breakouts.
pros: Works even for real problem skin, providing great all-day coverage without clogging pores
Does away with the need for concealer
cons: It has a more limited selection of available shades

customer_reviews.title: Mostly a Win!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I "break up" with this foundation and try something new I come back to it. EVERY SINGLE TIME. The coverage is great, it can be built upon for days that your face hates you. It doesn't break me out more. It covers up the redness. It goes on smoothly. While it doesn't come off just by looking at something it will rub off a smidge. Nothing like NARS (my god!) but it does have a bit of rub off so keep that in mind when trying on clothes. Overall this is the best foundation I've found that matches my pale self, gives good coverage and doesn't look cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A. Balazowich

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight foundation for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I love this as an everyday foundation. I have really bad aches on my cheeks and chin and this foundation is one of the few that haven’t made the acne worse. It’s very lightweight and I often forget that I have foundation on. My only complaint is that it doesn’t have a very good coverage when it comes to hiding my acne. You can still see some red spots even though if cover the blemish with foundation. If it had better coverage, I’d give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this make up for 6 years and it helps my acne! 😊 I’ll always use it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Haynes

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was worried this wouldn't be an original because I've had bad luck w Clinique products in the past on amazon like Dramatically Different Lotions not being authentic Clinique products & smelling like chemicals but this foundation feels like an original. Doesn't make my face feeling cakey. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for anyone with oily and sensitive skin. I would recommend going to a store to match your skin tone, but once you know what number matches your skin tone, it’s great to continue the purchase at Amazon! My skin is very oily and sensitive, and since I started using this foundation- about 10 years ago - I didn’t change for any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Pozzi

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique makeup and I was not disappointed on this purchase. The price was great and I got free shipping. The coverage is goid and it works well with my complexion. It’s not oily and found on even. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: just not the natural look I was going for
customer_reviews.text: Idk I wanted to like this but it just shows my pores more. All the other reviews made it seem like this is a sure product. Maybe it’s my pores are too big but just not the natural look I was going for
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great for problematic skin
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it dosnt cause pimples and have a good coverage overall, peace of mind won't increase my skin problem. Moreover, I was disappointed by the size it is small not as expected yet still worth it and I use it in celebrations.
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this Clinique make up for 10 years and have been purchasing it on amazon for about 2 years now. It is the real deal, not some sort of knock off. Price is comparable to buying in store but now I don’t have to go anywhere for it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat Raiff

customer_reviews.title: Fake. This is not the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: I like love clinique foundation. This is not the real thing. The feel and consistentacy are not right. I'm getting breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Graham

customer_reviews.title: Matches skin color beautifully, but horribly cakey.
customer_reviews.text: The color matched perfectly even though I purchased it online which I was over the moon happy about and it seemed to go on beautifully at the beginning, but as the day went on, specifically 2 hours later, the foundation started separating and looked very cakey. I tried applying it several different ways and times afterwards but no luck, still same outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Jenya Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Loving Clinique
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique foundations.. Especially if you have acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.author: James Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Clinique wins 💚
customer_reviews.text: The only foundation I ever use! Seriously feels weightless, smooth and lasts all day (12 he shifts).
customer_reviews.author: Candy Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite makeup! Best makeup for acne prone skin types!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying many foundations and all clogged pores. This is light and as promised no acne the next day. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Natural matte look (not full coverage)
customer_reviews.text: I use this foundation nearly daily, and have for quite a few years now. I don’t always take care of my skin, so it’s hard to judge the acne portion of this product, but elsewhere I love it. While not full coverage, it provides a more natural, matte look when properly blended.
customer_reviews.author: benryuu

customer_reviews.title: Ship to door
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique and being able to buy it on here makes it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Clinique makeup/
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected or exactly what I would have got at Macy’s
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: No breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation I have found that doesnt melt off before the end of a work day. Color and coverage is great. And my sensitive, acne prone skin hasn't broken out
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and this make up stays put for hours! It blends well and the product design sits well in my make up bag. I love this! I have had no break outs while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: After a long time looking for, finally one great foundation!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for oily skin! Stays all day and reduced my acne! Truly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is very trustworthy and helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. My skin is very sensitive and this makeup does very well. My experience with it is fantastic. Thank you Amazon for being so helpful. I could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: sonya coleman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great, light coverage. Perfectly matches my super pale skin! Love! Will become a new favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting skin in even tone
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for the first 5 hours. By the end of the day, its bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent
customer_reviews.text: I love the product...just got the wrong color and had to send back while Amazon makes extremely easy
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this makeup forever to keep my skin clear. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leeder

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good product. It covers well and helps with blemish ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. It covers well and helps with blemish prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup I've ever used! At 36 years old and after trying so so so many acne treatments this makeup is what finally has given me clear skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Hunter

customer_reviews.title: No acne, see above
customer_reviews.text: I do not need acne solutions; I am 80 yo! The print is so small on your website, I want even better glow, spf Cn 53 please
customer_reviews.author: marcia obrien

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup. Arrived in the normal Clinique box, looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Packaging problems
customer_reviews.text: I have used this foundation for years. It’s great. However this order is packaged incorrectly. I needed “fresh alabaster” and the sticker on the box was correct but the box said “fresh vanilla”. Any hopes of getting the right color were dashed when I opened and the bottle was fresh vanilla, which is too dark for my pasty skin. And I didn’t open it until I used the very last drop of my previous bottle...so now I guess no makeup for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how pale I became during this pandemic so I had to buy a new shade of foundation! I have oily and acne prone skin so I thought this product would be a win-win for me. It’s the EXACT shade of my skin. It’s light and it covers up my acne without having to add concealer. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Speed

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has acne-fighting ingredients as my skin is extremely break-out prone (which is really irritating when you're 44 years old!), and the coverage is pretty good. Since I didn't actually go in for a consult with a Clinique specialist, I had to guess which color to go with, and this one matches well at first but seems to get a little orang-y by the end of the day. I'm planning to go into a counter soon to get some insights on how to prevent this as it is possible I am doing something wrong or haven't matched the color up right. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. It doesn't break me out and my skin stays matter for at least 8 hours! I have extremely oily skin and this is the only foundation I've found that really works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea King

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and it's always done exactly as it's advertised: natural coverage and no acne. It's the only foundation I've used that doesn't feel like it's caking on my skin. The only problem I have is that my skin is in between shades... it's either too light or a little too dark on my face but it's not noticeable in certain lighting. I notice it because ofcourse I'm seeing mt face up close most of the time
customer_reviews.author: A.

product_meta.title: New! Clinique Acne Solutions Liquid Makeup, 1 oz / 30 ml, 01 Fresh Alabaster (VF-N)
product_meta.description: Color:01 Fresh Alabaster VF-NApply after using your Acne Solutions Clear Skin System or 3-Step Skin Care. Shake bottle well. Squeeze a few drops of foundation onto the back of your clean hand. With Foundation Brush or clean fingertips, smooth makeup into skin, starting in center of face, blending out toward hairline and jawline. Remove with your favourite Clinique oil-free makeup remover.
feature_bullets: Benefits: Treats Acne, Controls Oil. Feels so fresh, looks so natural. Non-irritating, oil-free makeup helps blend away blemishes, neutralize redness. Medicated ingredients help treat existing breakouts and keep them from coming back.
Skin Types: 2, 3, 4. Dry Combination, Combination Oily, Oily.
Full Size 1 oz / 30 ml, New In Box.
